name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: RGB LED backlit wireless gaming mouse with 6 programmable buttons, 16000 DPI sensor, and ergonomic design

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Blue switches, customizable RGB backlighting, and USB-C connection

name: USB-C Docking Station
description: Universal USB-C hub with dual 4K HDMI, 6 USB ports, Ethernet, SD card reader, and 100W power delivery

name: Wireless Bluetooth Headset
description: Over-ear wireless headset with active noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, and built-in microphone

name: Webcam 1080P HD
description: Full HD 1080p webcam with auto-focus, built-in dual microphones, and adjustable clip mount

name: External SSD 1TB
description: Portable external solid-state drive with 1TB capacity, USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1050MB/s read speed

name: Gaming Mouse Pad XXL
description: Extended gaming mouse pad 35.4x15.7 inches with stitched edges and non-slip rubber base

name: USB Condenser Microphone
description: Professional USB condenser microphone with cardioid pattern, shock mount, and pop filter

name: Monitor Stand Dual Arm
description: Adjustable dual monitor mount with gas spring arms, supports two 27-inch monitors up to 17.6 lbs each

name: Wireless Presenter Remote
description: USB wireless presenter with laser pointer, hyperlink control, and 100ft range for presentations
